lines.text: [Father Jacinto, in Tom's cell, prepares him for death]
Don't worry, Father, it's mine too.
You know, it's a funny thing that you of all people should be sitting beside me. You're precisely my type.
Mmm-hmm. How long were you in that prison?
Gusto Nash, you're fired, as of immediately!
I know it's not true. I just wanted to taste the words. Sheer rapture!
I'm not happy. I'm not happy at all!
